scripts.package:api-py: cd services/api-py && npx --yes serverless package --stage prod --region us-east-1
scripts.lint:cfn: cd services/api-py && TEMPLATE=$(ls .serverless/*template* 2>/dev/null | head -n1) && if [ -n "$TEMPLATE" ]; then python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install -q cfn-lint && .venv/bin/cfn-lint --format pretty $TEMPLATE; else echo 'No template found'; fi
